scripts.curl:local: BASE=http://localhost:3000; RESP=$(curl -sS -X POST "$BASE/api/games" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{}'); echo "$RESP"; if command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1; then ID=$(echo "$RESP" | jq -r '.id'); else ID=$(echo "$RESP" | sed -n 's/.*"id":"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/p'); fi; echo "id=$ID"; curl -sS "$BASE/api/games/$ID/export"
